segments.text: I ’ m so sorry to call you on such short notice , but something ’ s come up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean for this afternoon ’ s meeting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right I ’ m afraid I have to postpone it . Mr . Scott got sick and I have to attend the Speechmaker ’ s Symposium in his place . I ’ m leaving today , and I won ’ t be back until a week from Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s quite a while . Let ’ s make it the week after you get back , then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be great . So it ’ s two weeks from tomorrow , same time and place . I ’ m really sorry to do this to you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem at all . To tell you the truth , I could use the extra time in my schedule to catch up on some paperwork .
segments.speaker: S2
